import React, { Component } from 'react' import './../css/cart.css' import { X } from '@phosphor-icons/react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Userconsumer } from './CartContext' export class Cart extends Component { render() { return ( { (nn)=>{ return(

My Cart

{ nn[2] == 0 ?

Nothing Found

:

{nn[1].title}

Quantity {nn[0]}

{nn[1].price} LE

Total {nn[0]*nn[1].price}

}
)} } ) } } export default Cart
